channel.title: Skillcape EMOTES
channel.description:
ok i added skillcape emotes to my server
so you start doing the emote i does the gf and the character dnt move or do emotes?
how do i fix this?

item.title: Skillcape EMOTES
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:2, topic:353116”]set the emote to do the action, your methods are probly static void so it displays no error message. set the method public static void blahh(); to public static blahh();[/quote]Wow, you’re really dumb.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape EMOTES
item.dc:creator: @Fishy_Skillz Fishy Skillz
item.description:
@Fishy_Skillz wrote:

I Get This Error

client.java:22543: illegal start of expression
public static SkillCape() {
^
client.java:22543: illegal start of expression
public static SkillCape() {
^
client.java:22543: ‘;’ expected
public static SkillCape() {
^
3 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape EMOTES
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

set the emote to do the action, your methods are probly static void so it displays no error message. set the method public static void blahh(); to public static blahh();

Read full topic
